name: Candles (itch)
description:
There's no story in the game, all you do is just walk around and trying escape the room if you want. This game is mainly about searching, so don't expect a lot of fancy particle effects in it.

Traps:

There are two kinds of traps: spring trap and spike trap

Controls :

WSAD: Move   E:Interact   Q:Pickup   Mouse1: Place Object   Mouse2: Put off candle

This game is made by @Ojzach, @Tesrym, and @Orange.
